fields.forum_tags: Select a Forum tag to map

permissions.add_to_trello: Can link a discussion to Trello

settings.api_key_help: Enter the API key from {link} in order for this extension to connect with Trello.
settings.api_token_help: Enter the API token in order for this extension to connect with Trello. Visit {link} and click Generate a Token
settings.default_board_help: The selected default board will be the one that will be pre-selected in the Send to Trello modal in the forum.
settings.include_secondary_tags_help: When disabled, only primary discussion tags will be sent to Trello. When enabled, all tags will be sent to Trello.

mapping.no_mappings_for_board: There are no active tag mappings assigned for this board

settings.mappings_label: Forum tags to Trello labels mappings
settings.member_id_help: Enter the Trello Member ID to be used for fetching organization boards with Trello. (https://trello.com/your-trello-handle)
settings.unmapped_warning_help: Display a warning when sending a discussion to Trello if the Forum tags are not mapped to Trello tags

fields.member_selected: {count, plural, one {# member} other {# members}} selected

modals.no_mappings_for_board: Current selected board does not have Trello label mappings set for forum tags
modals.title: Send to Trello
